rows.label: tlk44500184_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! You seem to know much about the
outside world! May we talk?

rows.label: tlk44500184_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It's about the Luxuria food supply
problem.

rows.label: tlk44500184_04_msg0003
rows.name:
As you know, all Luxurian ether has
been diverted to the creation of
Core Chips.

rows.label: tlk44500184_04_msg0004
rows.name:
This has turned the environment into
a snow desert making it impossible to
grow crops...

rows.label: tlk44500184_04_msg0005
rows.name:
So if you could find some seeds that
can withstand the cold, we might be
able to start growing again.

rows.label: tlk44500184_04_msg0007
rows.name:
We may be able to bring back a little
promise to Luxuria if you succeed.
